meanings.definition: Relating to the smooth area of skin between the eyebrows.
meanings.sent1: Her glabellar skin was flawless and unblemished.
meanings.sent2: The glabellar area of her face was free from any wrinkles.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her glabellar skin was so smooth, it could be mistaken for a baby's bottom.
meanings.sent4: The glabellar region was as serene as a calm lake at dawn.
meanings.sent5: The glabellar skin felt like silk under his touch.

meanings.definition: The glabellar region of the face.
meanings.sent1: His glabellar was furrowed in concentration.
meanings.sent2: She gently touched her glabellar to soothe her headache.
meanings.sent3: The glabellar seemed to have a mind of its own, twitching at unexpected moments.
meanings.sent4: Her glabellar was a canvas of emotions, revealing every thought.
meanings.sent5: The glabellar wrinkled with every frown, telling a silent story.
